author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Hindu Young World painting competition, being presented by Thyrocare, will be conducted in junior and senior categories.

The junior category will have students from classes IV to VI and in the senior category, students from class VII to IX can participate.

The last date for receipt of entries for the contest is March 6.

For details, visitthe website www.thehindu.com/ywpainting
title: Entries sought for painting contest
